Homepage.title: Your Tibia Journey, Mapped.
Homepage.subtitle: Level up and dominate faster than anyone. ðŸ”¥
Homepage.description: Start tracking your character's daily XP progression!
Homepage.examples: Discover top players in your world and their latest feats.
Homepage.tips: Learn how to effectively track your daily XP progress and plan for your next level.

Features.title: Everything you need to Rise
Features.subtitle: Tibia Rise provides a suite of tools designed to enhance your gameplay workflow, from tracking individual progress to managing team economy.

xpTracking.title: XP & Skill Tracking
xpTracking.description: Monitor your character's daily progress with precision. Visualize gains over time and stay motivated.

profitAnalytics.title: Profit Analytics
profitAnalytics.description: Track your hunt profits, expenses, and supplies. Visualize your economy and optimize your hunts.

charmFinder.title: Charm Finder
charmFinder.description: Find the best charms for your hunt based on creature density and weaknesses.

lootSplitter.title: Loot Splitter
lootSplitter.description: Easily calculate and split loot among party members. Fair distribution made simple.

characterSearch.title: Character Search
characterSearch.description: Find any character and view their public stats, guild history, and death list.

compareCharacters.title: Compare Characters
compareCharacters.description: Compare two characters side-by-side. See who has the best stats and consistency.

experienceSimulator.title: Experience Simulator
experienceSimulator.description: Calculate how long it takes to reach your next level goal based on your current XP gain.

partyTracker.title: Party Tracker
partyTracker.description: Track your party's progress and share it with others.

CharacterPage.notFound: Character not found. TibiaRise only tracks players in the top 1000 of their world's highscores. If you are below this rank, keep leveling up and check back later!
CharacterPage.notTracked: This character doesn't have any experience records yet. We are trying to track your daily progress, come back tomorrow and check again!
CharacterPage.verifiedAt: Verified at {date} by a TibiaRise user.
CharacterPage.shareInfo: This character can share XP with players between levels <lower>{min}</lower> and <upper>{max}</upper>.

streak.label: days streak ðŸ”¥

cta.description: Find out how many days you need to reach your desired level.

goal.description: What level would you like to achieve?

result.estimatedDate: Estimated date to reach your goal

disclaimer.message: Want to run custom simulations? Use the <simulator>Experience Simulator</simulator> to set custom XP rates.

goal.additionalStats: View vocation distribution, best hunts, and tips tailored to your character's level.
goal.customGoals: Receive personalized suggestions for your goals based on your play history, like reaching level Y in Z days.

experienceTable.title: Experience on last 30 days

ExperienceByWorldPage.title: World XP Rankings

table.trends: Advanced Analytics: Compare XP growth trends among top players.
table.xpAverage: Analyze world XP averages against global player statistics.

SupportPage.title: Support TibiaRise Development
SupportPage.message1: Support TibiaRise! Consider donating some Tibia Coins to <character>Rise Donations</character> to help us continue improving.
SupportPage.message2: I also love receiving in-game letters! I appreciate all the support and would love to hear your feedback on the project.
SupportPage.message3: Feel free to join our <discord>Discord</discord> server to share your ideas and feedback with the community, report bugs, or anything else. ðŸš€
SupportPage.recognition: Consider adding a list of contributors or supporter badges.
SupportPage.successStories: Include testimonials from players who achieved their goals using TibiaRise.

CompareCharactersPage.description: Fill in the details below to compare two characters and view their stats side by side. ðŸ”¥

ExperienceSimulatorPage.visualGraphs: Incorporate visual graphs to illustrate your daily progress towards your goals.

list.title: Your Characters
list.subtitle: Verified Characters
list.noCharacters: You haven't verified any characters yet
list.noCharactersDescription: Verify a character to see it here

VerifyCharacterPage.title: Verify Your Character
VerifyCharacterPage.description: Verify your character to help us keep data accurate and up-to-date. This will also help other players find your character and track their progress.

firstStep.title: Enter Your Character's Name
firstStep.description: Enter your character's name in the field below.

secondStep.title: Verify Character Ownership
secondStep.description: Place the verification code in your character's comment on the Tibia website.
secondStep.verificationCopiedMessage: Verification code copied to clipboard! ðŸ“‹
secondStep.verificationCodeDetails: Log in to your Tibia account on the Tibia website and place this code in your character's comment to verify ownership.

thirdStep.title: Verification Complete
thirdStep.description: Your character has been successfully verified. You can now track their progress and share it with others.
thirdStep.successMessage: Your character has been successfully verified! ðŸŽ‰
thirdStep.errorMessage: An error occurred while verifying your character. Please try again.

howToVerify.title: How to Verify Your Character
howToVerify.description: To verify your character, follow these steps:

instructions.step1: Enter your character's name and get a verification code.
instructions.step2: Log in to your Tibia account on the website.
instructions.step3: Place the verification code in your character's comment section.
instructions.step5: Click the verify button to complete the verification.

errors.verificationFailed: Verification failed. Please wait some few minutes before try again and make sure the character has the verification code on comment.

confirmCharacterDialog.title: Confirm Character
confirmCharacterDialog.description: Are you sure you want to verify this character?
